Gram of Volatile Anaesthetic per Hour

Source: R/conversion.R
gram_per_hour.Rd

Gram of Volatile Anaesthetic per Hour

gram_per_hour(mass, mac, fgf, temperature = 293.15, pressure = 101.325)

Arguments

mass

double, molare mass in g/mol.
mac

double, minimum alveolar concentration (as ratio, e.g. for 2 %, 0.02).
fgf

double, fresh gas flow in litre per minute.
temperature

double in Kelvin.
pressure

double in kPa.

Value

double, gram of volatile anaesthetic per hour.

Examples

gram_per_hour(200, 0.02, 0.5)
#> [1] 4.988544
